div.style: font-family: Raleway; font-size: 0px; color: white; text-transform: uppercase; padding: 0px

p.style: display: inline-block; padding: 0.6rem 1rem; font-size: 12px; letter-spacing: 3px; background-color: rgb(79, 195, 247);
display: inline-block; padding: 0.6rem 1rem; font-weight: 700; font-size: 12px; letter-spacing: 3px; background-color: rgb(3, 169, 244);
